text: Juan Manual Martínez de Manzanillo, O.P. (died 1592) was a Roman Catholic prelate who served as Bishop of Coro (1583–1592). (in Latin) ==Biography== Juan Manual Martínez de Manzanillo was ordained a priest in the Order of Preachers. On 23 March 1583, he was appointed during the papacy of Pope Gregory XIII as Bishop of Coro. He served as Bishop of Coro until his death on 1 January 1592. == References == ==External links and additional sources== * (for Chronology of Bishops) * (for Chronology of Bishops) Category:16th- century Roman Catholic bishops Category:Bishops appointed by Pope Gregory XIII Category:1592 deaths Category:Dominican bishops
title: Juan Manual Martínez de Manzanillo
